findings.title: can add malicious price feeds after they have been added to
findings.description: Owner of strategies that inherit from BaseStrategyChainlinkMultiplePriceFeeds can add malicious price feeds for new collections after they have been added to LooksRareProtocol.

findings.title: The Protocol owner can drain users' currency tokens
findings.description: The Protocol `owner` can drain users' `currency` tokens that have been approved to the protocol.

findings.title: Unenforced length comparisons in strategy implementations
findings.description: Length comparisons are implicitly enforced through the compiler's out-of-bound revert instead of being explicitly enforced.
